#summary A list of all attributes supported by EZ Access, and those that are not supported.

= Introduction =

The following attributes are from the official [http://code.google.com/p/ez-access-web/downloads/detail?name=EZ%20Access%20Browser%20plugin%20Stage%201.doc specifications document]. The attributes and features are listed as supported, partially supported, or not (and when it will be, if ever).


= Details =

=== {{{<body>}}} tag attributes ===
|| *Name* || *Code* || *Description* || *Support* ||
|| Screenwrap toggle || {{{data-ez-screenwrap}}} || If tag present, specifies if the EZ navigation highlight exhibits a wrapping behavior at the top and bottom of the page. || <font color="green">Fully supported</font> ||
|| Start at || {{{data-ez-startat="IDREF IDREF"}}} || [dataEzStartat] || <font color="green">Fully supported</font> ||
|| Allow re-order || {{{data-ez-allowreorder}}} || Specifies if the page is to be navigated in the DOM order only or if it is to be navigated in a re-ordered fashion as specified by the {{{tabindex}}} and {{{aria-flowto}}} attributes. || <font color="red">Not supported</font> ||
|| [dataEzTabnav Tab Navigation] || {{{data-ez-tabnav}}} || Specifies how Tab and Shift+Tab navigate on the screen. || <font color="orange">Partially supported</font><br>[dataEzTabnav More information] ||
|| Auto Repeat || {{{data-ez-autorepeat}}} || Specifies the auto-repeat behavior of the EZ Access buttons and keyboard keys. || <font color="red">Not supported</font> ||
|| EZ Access starting mode || {{{data-ez-startingmode}}}<br>*Values:* default, ezon, ezoff || Specifies if EZ Access mode is on when the user opens the page. || <font color="red">Not supported</font> ||
|| Slide to read on/off || {{{data-ez-slidetoread}}}<br>*Values:* on, off || Default is on. Specifies that the slide-to-read functionality is turned on or off for a page. || <font color="green">Fully supported</font> ||
